testcase.system-out: @scenario.begin @Test_Custom_Message_SMS_Shortlinks_5 @Test_Custom_Message_SMS_Shortlinks scenario: Carrying out test campaign Message given I am on the message creation page "Shortlink" in "SMS" ... passed in 50.0s e when I enter a valid campaign ID ... passed in 3.199s when I enter a valid URL ... passed in 3.43s when I create a custom message with the wildcards and shortlink ... passed in 15.0s when I verify my message ... passed in 0.01469s when I write the number for the test ... passed in 1.185s when I click on the "Verify Cost" button to continue ... passed in 6.391s when I see the cost of the message ... passed in 0.02075s when I click on the "send" button and confirm to continue ... passed in 3.676s when I am see the confirmation alert, "The message was successfully sent" in "(//div[@class='ant-notification-notice-description'])[1]" ... passed in 4.238s when I click on the "next" button to continue ... passed in 3.454s then I am redirected to the summary page ... passed in 3.003s @scenario.end ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
